verses.roman:
patita-pāvana-hetu tomāra avatāra
āmā-ba-i jagate, patita nāhi āra

synonyms: patita-pāvana—deliverance of the fallen; hetu—for the matter of; tomāra—Your; avatāra—incarnation; āmā-ba-i—than us; jagate—in this world; patita—fallen; nāhi—there is not; āra—more.
translation: Both brothers submitted, "Dear Lord, You have incarnated to deliver the fallen souls. You should consider that in this world there is none so fallen as us.
